title: Monument to honor King planned for Georgia's Stone Mountain
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Planning is under way to place a Liberty Bell replica atop Stone Mountain near Atlanta as a memorial to the Rev. Martin Luther King Jr. that...
